xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 19 Atītattika » 19.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Atītattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
18.
2654Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2655Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2656Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  purejātapaccayena paccayo…  pacchājātapaccayena paccayo…  āhārapaccayena paccayo…  indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
<< Suddhaup19.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya >>
